entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:05 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 7:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -31.9°C
Wind: SSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28 except minus 32 in the Postville area.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28 except minus 32 in the Postville area. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming north 80 gusting to 110 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 17. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Windy. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
